comments:
Recompute statistics with well as the unit (or mixed-effects with well/plate random effects); use plate-matched negcons.

Report pooled-SD (Hedges g) and show per-well distributions; drop “unprecedented” language unless benchmarked.

Disambiguate replication stress vs cell death: quantify nuclear area, DNA integrated intensity, “pyknotic” nuclei fraction, micronuclei rate, and include a simple apoptosis proxy if possible.

Use standard CellProfiler texture/granularity features in addition to the Laplacian metric; confirm robustness to blur/illumination/threshold choices.

Add orthogonal validation: EdU, γH2AX/53BP1/RPA foci, cell-cycle phase, and (if claiming heterochromatin) H3K9me3.
